did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 50 items.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Additional Quinby Family Papers, Accession #2338-c, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Quinby family papers were a gift to the library from Mr. Upshur Evans on November 3, 1982.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Quinby family papers consists chefly of correspondence, promissory notes, genealogical information, newsclippings, photographs, and printed material concerning the geneaology and history of the Quinby and related families of Ayres, Evans, Farnham, Frye, Ingalls, Hassam, Holt, Teakle, Upshur, and Wilson.

did.unittitle:
Promissory Notes of Upshur B. Quinby
1883-1890
Genealogy: "Ancestors of Upshur Balderstone Quinby and Georgie Richardson" [1969]
Genealogy: "My Birthplace and My Home" by Edna Evans Bell (Part II) ca. 1969
Newspaper Clippings and Printed Material 1966-1974, n.d.
